results.content: These course is very amazing. I personally did not have any knowledge on web design, but following this course diligently I have my own website now. I recommend this course to all beginners who want to learn html and CSS from scratch to pro.

response.content:
Thanks so much for sharing your experience. I'm delighted to know that this course has been helpful to you

Cheers!
